description.english: Get out of your own room.
description.german: Verlasse dein Zimmer.
description.spanish: Sal de tu habitación.
description.japanese: 自分の部屋を出る。

displayName.japanese: アイテムを手に入れた

description.english: Pick up an item.
description.german: Hebe einen Gegenstand auf.
description.spanish: Coge un objeto.

description.english: Meet the red butterfly.
description.german: Triff den roten Schmetterling.
description.spanish: Encuentra a la mariposa roja.

displayName.japanese: ブリンキング アイズ

description.english: Complete the blinking eyes puzzle.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel um die blinzelnden Augen.
description.french: Terminer l'énigme des yeux qui clignent.
description.italian: Completa il rompicapo degli occhi ammiccanti.
description.spanish: Completa el puzle de los ojos.
description.japanese: ブリンキング アイズのパズルを完成させる。
description.swedish: Slutför pusslet med de blinkande ögonen.
description.brazilian: Conclua o enigma d’Os olhos piscantes.

description.english: Complete the fan puzzle.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel um den Ventilator.
description.spanish: Completa el puzle del ventilador.
description.japanese: ファン パズルを完成させる。

description.english: Get the table near all the photos to break.
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass der Tisch bei den Fotos zerbricht.
description.french: Casser la table près des photos.
description.italian: Avvicina il tavolo alle foto per rompere.
description.spanish: Consigue que se rompa la mesa que hay cerca de todas las fotos.
description.schinese: 将桌子移到所有照片附近以对它进行破坏。
description.japanese: 写真の近くにあるテーブルを壊す。
description.swedish: Få bordet nära alla foton att gå sönder.
description.brazilian: Faça com que a mesa perto de todas as fotos quebre.

description.english: Get the sledgehammer.
description.german: Erhalte den Vorschlaghammer.
description.spanish: Consigue la maza.
description.japanese: スレッジハンマーを手に入れる。

displayName.spanish: La mano que mece la bolsa

description.italian: Finisci la conversazione con la borsa.
description.spanish: Finaliza la conversación con la bolsa.
description.japanese: バッグとの会話を終わらせる。
description.brazilian: Conclua a conversa com a bolsa.

description.english: Find your way through the maze.
description.german: Finde den Weg durch das Labyrinth.
description.spanish: Encuentra la salida del laberinto.
description.japanese: 迷路を抜ける手段を見つける。

displayName.brazilian: O tempo não passa de uma ilusão

description.english: Complete the clock puzzle.
description.german: Löse das Uhren-Rätsel.
